Ubuntu has held a <nowiki>[[UbuntuGlobalJam|Global Jam]]</nowiki> for several releases, and have scheduled one for the weekend of 6th - 8th of February. We've participated in several previous ones, so we should do so this release cycle also!

=== Locations ===

==== San Diego ====

* When: Sunday February 7, 2015, 3 - 5PM
* Where: Starbucks Coffee (Sports Arena & Rosecrans)
* RSVP link: http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-california/3028-glabal-jam-san-diego/
* Learn about ways to get involved with Ubuntu, as well as talk about the ways to work on bugs in the Ubuntu ecosystem

==== San Francisco ====

* When: Sunday February 8, 2015, noon - 5PM
* Where: Gandi, 121 2nd st, Ste. 500, San Francisco 94105
* RSVP link: http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-california/2984-ubuntu-california-san-francisco-qa-jam/
* We will be doing Xubuntu ISO and application testing
